title: Home screen not loading
body: I can click on all of the pages, like the store and masteries and those load fine. however when i am on the homescreen i cannot load the middle screen. I have tried several different methods like checking my internet settings but nothing is working. thanks

replies.body: This black screen usually happens with a bad connection that can't keep steady and download assets.  Give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go for a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Its not my internet connection. I have the internet plugged straight into the desktop. has to be something else
